summary: This bill, the Internal Revenue Service Math and Taxpayer Help Act, amends the IRS code to improve notices of math or clerical errors. It mandates more specific and comprehensive information in error notices, including the type of error, related code sections, and itemized computations of adjustments. It also requires the IRS to provide notice of abatements in clear language and a pilot program using certified mail. The bill further establishes procedures for taxpayers to request abatements and requests a report to Congress regarding such programs.
